attributes.description:
2018 Suzuki Ignus 1.2 GLX manual for sale. Don't miss this low mileage city runabout available in top spec. 
Standard Features: Android Auto | Apple Car Play | Bluetooth | Keyless Entry | LED Daytime running lights | Multi-Function Steering Wheel | Reverse Camera | Rear Park distance control | USB | 12v Socket | Adjustable Steering Wheel | Air Bags | Air Conditioning | Alarm | Central Locking |  Cloth Upholstery | Electric Door Mirrors |  Electric Windows |  Front Armrest | Front Fog Lights | Height Adjustable Drivers Seat | ISOFIX | USB and AUX |
Balance of 5 Year Warranty.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Suzuki Ignis 1.2 GLX
Power - 61 kW @ 6000 rpm
Torque - 113 Nm @ 4200 rpm
Economy - 5.1 l/100km
Emissions - 119 g/km
Emissions Rating - X
Gears - 5 / FRONT
Acceleration - 11.6 seconds
Top Speed - 165 km/h
Airbags (total) - 2
Length - 3,700 mm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 32 litres
Boot Capacity - 260 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
